name: The Adventures of Mr. Whiskers
description:
Swiggles, the octopus plushie, got their heart broken! It is up to Mr. Whiskers to help repair the fragmented pieces.

Game movement:

Use the arrow keys to move. Click the up arrow key twice to double jump!

I want to make this game longer, add new plot points, and more obstacles. All of the assets are made by me.
